title: Trailer for DS201: DataStax Enterprise Foundations of Apache Cassandra™
description:
https://academy.datastax.com/courses | Our self-paced courses are the easiest way to learn Apache Cassandra™ and DataStax Enterprise. Advance at your own speed, or prepare for certification. This beginner level introduction to Apache Cassandra™ outlines challenges encountered when attempting to scale with relational databases, and how NoSQL databases like Apache Cassandra™ address those challenges. It reviews the Apache Cassandra™ architecture, benefits, and how to use the Apache Cassandra™ read and write paths. Finally, it reviews Apache Cassandra™ distributions and helps you determine the best fit for your needs.

Take the course: https://academy.datastax.com/resources/ds101-introduction-cassandra

ABOUT DATASTAX ENTERPRISE 5
DataStax Enterprise 5.0, the database platform for cloud applications, includes Apache Cassandra 3.x with materialized views, tiered storage and advanced replication. Introduced in 5.0 is DataStax Enterprise Graph, the first graph database fast enough to power customer-facing applications, scale to massive datasets and integrate advanced tools to power deep analytical queries.

Learn more at http://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-enterprise and https://academy.datastax.com/resources/whats-new-datastax-enterprise-50

ABOUT DATASTAX
On the DataStax YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, webinars and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on DataStax Enterprise©. DataStax, the leading provider of database software for cloud applications, accelerates the ability of enterprises, government agencies, and systems integrators to power the exploding number of cloud applications that require data distribut

transcript.text: welcome to DS 201 data stacks enterprise foundations of Apache Cassandra I'm Patrick McFadden this course is a solid introduction to the core database features of data stacks enterprise based on Apache Cassandra we're going to start by introducing you to the data stacks enterprise data model almost always the first question people have concepts like partition keys clustering columns can be really confusing at first we give you just enough the query language cql to get you started then we take a look under the hood and dig into how data stacks enterprise management disk IO on each and every node will demystify the core reason of why Apache Cassandra is so amazingly performant and one of my favourite topics the architecture as a distributed system it may be a completely new thing to you but that's okay we'll walk you to the concepts like replication consistency and the trade-offs you now have to make the systems you build on top of data stacks Enterprise amazing all this and more don't wait let's start the course you [Music]
